headline: Intuit Launches New AI-Powered Construction Edition for Intuit Enterprise Suite
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., February 11, 2026--Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, Mailchimp and Intuit Enterprise Suite, today announced the launch of a new construction edition for Intuit Enterprise Suite, an AI-native, end-to-end ERP built specifically for the complex realities of the $2 trillion construction industry. content.title: Intuit Launches New AI-Powered Construction Edition for Intuit Enterprise Suite
content.summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., February 11, 2026--Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, Mailchimp and Intuit Enterprise Suite, today announced the launch of a new construction edition for Intuit Enterprise Suite, an AI-native, end-to-end ERP built specifically for the complex realities of the $2 trillion construction industry.
